title: peralAm urutuNai
sahitya:
peralAm urutuNai tiruvEragam adil uraiyum gurupara kumaran aruLAl


anupallavi

  karuNaiyin uruvAi varuvOrai viraivil kaDaittEri viDum vaDivElaniDam


caraNam    karma vinaiyODa parama sukham tEDa karuNAkaran avan kazhalaDi tanai nADi
kurai yAvum eDuttu kUrik-krpai sheyya kOrik-karaindavan sIraDip-perumai pADi
